vote.title: Authorize a Chapter 380 Economic Development Grant Agreement in an amount not to exceed $500,000.00 with HAECO Global Engine Support, LLC and/or its affiliate in consideration of a new aviation engine repair facility to be located at 11124 Goodnight Lane, Dallas, Texas 75229 including requirements for (a) the relocation and/or creation of 170 full-time jobs to the city of Dallas subject to a minimum 25% local hiring requirement; and (b) required minimum private investment of $17.5 million, in accordance with the City of Dallas Economic Development Incentive Policy - Not to exceed $500,000.00 - Financing: Public/Private Partnership Fund
vote.description: Authorize a Chapter 380 Economic Development Grant Agreement in an amount not to exceed $500,000.00 with HAECO Global Engine Support, LLC and/or its affiliate in consideration of a new aviation engine repair facility to be located at 11124 Goodnight Lane, Dallas, Texas 75229 including requirements for (a) the relocation and/or creation of 170 full-time jobs to the city of Dallas subject to a minimum 25% local hiring requirement; and (b) required minimum private investment of $17.5 million, in accordance with the City of Dallas Economic Development Incentive Policy - Not to exceed $500,000.00 - Financing: Public/Private Partnership Fund
